description: A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth  as specified by the [Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)](https://www.healthit.gov/newsroom/about-onc).

element.comments: The codes required are intended to present birth sex (i.e., the sex recorded on the patient’s birth certificate) and not gender identity or reassigned sex.
element.definition: A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth  as specified by the [Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)](https://www.healthit.gov/newsroom/about-onc).

name: Sex of patient assigned at birth
publisher: Health Level Seven International (US Realm Steering Committee)
